attributes.action: CEASE ALL MONITARY AID TO INDIA.
attributes.additional_details:
Not only is the Indian Government developing its own space programme but it can also afford to order eight Boing P-8A Poseidon Marine surveillance @ $175 Million each.
The Indian Government clearly do not need aid from Britain if they can afford to run a space programme and buy military hardware at these prices, when they can in fact easily fund their own aid programmes for the poor of their nation.
The British Government must therefor cease wasting British Taxpayers money on aid to India when it is clearly unnecessary and at a time when British people are suffering all round cuts in services.
This waste of aid money is a dereliction of authority and should be rectified IMMEDIATELY.
